release.action: MEVENIDE-77 - before running any goal, save edited files.
MEVENIDE-76 - completed the fix, also debugging of artifact works now.
MEVENIDE-48 Global setting of dependency download progress display. A reaonable default set to avoid too much output.
MEVENIDE-37 fixed. (Nervous classpath scanning - IDE too often regenerated classpath info)
MEVENIDE-65 fixed. (a maven.xml based goal doesn't require a ':' character anymore)
Maven output error parsing. Linking failed tests and compilation errors.
Added basic support for testing the project, single class and test. (MEVENIDE-50)
Added basic support for running the project and running single class.
Added project view support for web apps.

Initial release, allows to open maven projects within Netbeans IDE 4.0. Sources, test sources and resources are displayed within the project tree. UI updates on chanches in POM and properties files. Code completion on dependencies.
When project declares maven.multiproject.includes, projects included get opened as well.
Possible to execute arbitrary maven goal or sequence of goals. IDE actions and shortcuts are matched to relevant maven goals. The goals are customizable per project or user.
